main event: Multiple observers reported seeing numerous unidentified objects streaking across the sky in Ellerbe, North Carolina, on November 17, 1965.
interesting points: The objects appeared as pinpoint lights with small tails of sparks,The observers estimated the size of the objects to be similar to a pinhead at arm's length,The color observed was a white burning light with occasional red-orange sparks,Over a two-hour period, up to twenty-five such objects were sighted by the observers,Observations were hindered by the lack of discernible features due to the objects' appearance only as light.
sighted object: pinpoint lights with tails of sparks
witness description: One observer is a reliable salesman, while the other is a law enforcement officer for the city of Ellerbe.
